roleDescriptions.admin: Manages team, approves members, sets permissions
roleDescriptions.editor: Creates and edits own evolutions, invites colleagues

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Bot
whatsapp.scanQR: Scan QR Code with your WhatsApp
whatsapp.commandsDescription: Send these commands to interact with the system

compliance.title: Security & Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Your data protected by the highest international standards
compliance.hipaaFull: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
compliance.hipaaDesc: Compliance with US healthcare privacy regulations
compliance.lgpdDesc: Compliance with Brazilian data protection law
compliance.gdprDesc: Compliance with European data protection regulation
compliance.securitySubtitle: Multi-layer protection for your clinical data
compliance.encryptionDesc: All data encrypted at rest and in transit
compliance.mfaDesc: Additional protection with 2FA for all accounts
compliance.secureServersDesc: Infrastructure in SOC 2 certified data centers
compliance.auditDesc: Logs of all actions for traceability
compliance.enterpriseDesc: Enterprise plan includes additional compliance features: custom audit reports, guaranteed SLA, dedicated 24/7 support, and hospital management system integration.

hero.title: Less paperwork.
hero.subtitle: Complete system for inpatient management with SBAR evolution, predictive AI and analytics. Built by doctors, for doctors.
hero.speechBubble: Structured, fast and secure clinical communication for your medical team.

features.title: Everything you need in one place
features.subtitle: Built by a doctor who understood the pain of losing information amid the chaos of messaging apps and paper.
features.registerDesc: Add patients by voice or typing with intelligent duplicate detection.
features.sbarDesc: Standardized structure that ensures clear communication across the team.
features.aiDesc: Discharge prediction, length of stay and deterioration alerts.
features.analyticsDesc: Productivity metrics, outcomes and team performance.
features.lgpdDesc: Granular permissions and anonymized data for full compliance.
features.collabDesc: Share information without the noise of messaging apps.

testimonials.title: What doctors say
testimonials.t1: I reduced evolution time from 15 to 3 minutes. Now I have more time for patients.
testimonials.t2: The predictive AI alerted me to a deterioration I hadn't noticed. It saved a life.
testimonials.t3: I finally managed to organize my team without depending on WhatsApp groups.

cta.title: Ready to transform your medical practice?
cta.subtitle: Join over 2,500 doctors who already save hours per week and provide better patient care.

pricing.title: Start free, scale when you need
pricing.subtitle: 30 days free with full access. Then choose the ideal plan.

welcome.title: Welcome to SBAR Health
welcome.description: The clinical intelligence platform that revolutionizes communication between healthcare professionals using the SBAR method.

patient.title: Register your Patients
patient.description: Add patients quickly with intelligent ICD-10 diagnosis, insurance and clinical data. Use voice input to speed up.

hospital.title: Link to Hospitals
hospital.description: Connect to the hospitals where you work. Search existing hospitals or create new ones. Unified data for accurate reports.

team.title: Work as a Team
team.description: Create or join medical teams. Share patients, do shift handoffs and receive real-time notifications.

sbar.title: Evolve with SBAR
sbar.description: Record structured evolutions: Situation, Background, Assessment and Recommendation. Clear and standardized communication.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Receive shift handoff alerts, patient discharge and critical updates even with the browser closed.

chat.title: Secure Team Chat
chat.description: Communicate with total confidentiality. Only your team members can read messages. Intra-team and extra-team chat with encryption.

global.title: Automatic Translation
global.description: Translate diagnoses and evolutions between 5 languages. Collaborate with international teams without language barriers.

onboarding.setupProfile: Let's set up your medical profile in seconds

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission for this action.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

confirmations.archivePatient: Are you sure you want to archive this patient?
confirmations.archivePatientDesc: The patient will be moved to the archived list and can be restored later.
confirmations.dischargePatientDesc: This action will record the patient's medical discharge.
confirmations.archiveTeamDesc: All members will be notified and the team will be moved to archived.
